meanings.definition: Plasmodesmas: microscopic channels in plant cell walls that allow for communication and transport between cells.
meanings.sent1: The plasmodesmas in the plant cell walls help in passing messages between cells.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study plasmodesmas to understand how cells communicate in plants.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous plant cells played a game of telephone using the plasmodesmas.
meanings.sent4: The plasmodesmas are like secret tunnels connecting the plant cells.
meanings.sent5: Visualize the plasmodesmas as tiny walkie-talkies linking the plant cells together.
